data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 2,215 believers in Lot that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lot, Occitanie, France
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Lot to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Lot, Occitanie, France.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the 2,215 believers find a person of peace today among the 178,085 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Lot, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Iu Mien people.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Lot, Occitanie, France to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Lot, Occitanie, France into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lot, Occitanie, France has a population of 180,300.

We estimate Lot has 2,215 people who might know Jesus, 110,257 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 67,828 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 110,257 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
